text: Lavalle Department is a department located in the northeast of Mendoza Province in Argentina. The provincial subdivision has a population of about 32,000 inhabitants in an area of , and its capital city is Villa Tulumaya, which is located around from the Capital federal. ==Districts== Capilla de Nuestra Señora del Rosario, Lagunas del Rosario *Costa de Araujo *El Carmen *El Chilcal *El Plumero *El Vergel *Gustavo André *Jocolí *Jocolí Viejo *La Asunción *La Holanda *La Palmera *La Pega *Las Violetas *Lagunas del Rosario *Paramillo *San Francisco *San José *San Miguel *Tres de Mayo ==External links== *Tourist Guide (Spanish) Category:1853 establishments in Argentina Category:Departments of Mendoza Province
title: Lavalle Department, Mendoza
